example.code:
PS C:\>Get-EC2Volume
VolumeId : vol-123456 Size : 8 SnapshotId : snap-123456 AvailabilityZone : us-west-2c State : available CreateTime : 7/17/2013 4:35:19 PM Attachments : {} Tags : {} VolumeType : standard IOPS :
VolumeId : vol-654321 Size : 200 ...

PS C:\>Get-EC2Volume -Filter @{ Name="status"; Values="available" }
VolumeId : vol-123456 Size : 8 SnapshotId : snap-123456 AvailabilityZone : us-west-2c State : available CreateTime : 7/17/2013 4:35:19 PM Attachments : {} Tags : {} VolumeType : standard IOPS :
example.description: Returns the collection of volumes that have the status 'available'.

example.code:
PS C:\>Get-EC2Volume -Filter @{ Name="status"; Values=@("available", "in-use") }
VolumeId : vol-123456 Size : 8 SnapshotId : snap-123456 AvailabilityZone : us-west-2c State : available CreateTime : 7/17/2013 4:35:19 PM Attachments : {} Tags : {} VolumeType : standard IOPS :
example.description: Returns the collection of volumes that have the status 'available' or 'in-use'.
